alert.note: Alert for Elkhart; La Porte; Marshall; St. Joseph; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 1:29AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG THIS MORNING... Fog will continue to develop over northwest Indiana and far southwest Lower Michigan early this morning. The fog has already become dense with visibilities around a quarter of a mile at a few locations near and southeast of Lake Michigan. Elevated surfaces are likely to become slippery with early morning temperatures near freezing. The pockets of dense fog are likely to persist into mid morning with some visibilities still around or below a quarter of a mile past 9 AM EST. If you are traveling early this morning, slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. Watch out for frost or ice on elevated surfaces including bridges and overpasses that may become extremely slippery.

area.areaDesc: Elkhart; La Porte; Marshall; St. Joseph; Starke
